wordpressPage.content:
A new game from the depths of captivity!
~ Rising from slavery with just one’s own abilities ~

Takumi, a young guy born and raised in an environment filled with welfare, left our world without getting the chance of testing his abilities. Thanks to that regret, he’s granted the opportunity of reincarnating in a new world.
In the presence of a Goddess, he decides to “reincarnate in a world where abilities are everything”!
After being reincarnated as a slave, he wakes up in cell and starts gathering information from the other children in the room, included a gorgeous elf and a beautiful beastman who will become his comrades. With that, he starts down the path to becoming a slave merchant.

  • New game’s consistency guide

A new game from the depths of captivity!
~The slave merchant lays his hands on a pure girl after earning his status and some credit~
